View the UIC Campus Map to find our location.  1 st Floor of Burnham Hall 828 S. Halsted Street (MC 204) Chicago, IllinoisÂ  60607  General Inquiries   Main Office: 312-41 3-2260  Fax: 312-413-1266  Email:  hcollege@uic.edu   Advertising  If you'd like to advertise to the Honors College student community, please complete the announcement request form . Please note that all announcements must be relevant and suitable for Honors College dissemination and should be submitted at least 2-3 days in advance.
